channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cop Transforms Into Frog According To AI Generated Police Report
item.description: An AI police report tool turned a cop into a “frog,” exposing how generative AI in policing can warp reality.

item.title: Venezuela’s capital Caracas is unusually quiet with stores and gas stations closed, a day after Maduro was deposed by U.S.
item.description: A day before, lines wound through stores and outside gas stations as uncertain Venezuelans stocked up on goods in case turmoil broke out.

item.title: What is the Monroe Doctrine? Here’s how it has shaped U.S. foreign policy for two centuries, including Trump’s ouster of Maduro
item.description: It was intended to ward off European colonization or other interference in the Western Hemisphere. In return, the U.S. also agreed to stay out of Euro...

item.title: Apple Won’t Release iPhone 18 In 2026, New Report Claims
item.description: If you’re looking forward to buying the iPhone 18, it seems you’re going to have a long wait.

item.title: Rubio says the U.S. doesn’t need Venezuelan oil but seeks to deny adversaries control over it—and doesn’t rule out occupying the country
item.description: "What we're not going to allow is for the oil industry in Venezuela to be controlled by adversaries of the United States."

item.title: The ‘Stranger Things’ Finale Dethroned In Netflix’s Top 10 List By A New Show
item.description: Despite just airing a blockbuster finale, there's a new show that has unseated Stranger Things on the top of Netflix's top 10 list.

item.title: The U.S. military emerged as a big winner after Maduro’s capture. The other sensation is this Nike outfit
item.description: "Maduro looks like a man who was on Xmas break and wearing his Nike Tech Fleece for a third straight day."

item.title: The U.S. accuses Maduro and his wife of ordering kidnappings, beatings and murders, among other charges
item.description: Maduro’s wife is also accused of accepting hundreds of thousands of dollars in bribes in 2007.

item.title: Apple iPhone 18 May See A Sharp Price Increase, New Report Claims
item.description: The next iPhone could have a processor inside that’s a lot more expensive. Which will likely increase the price of the phone.

item.title: The Housemaid 2 ‘Guaranteed’ By Its Star After Becoming A Box Office Smash
item.description: The Housemaid is turning into a box office hit and as such, The Housemaid 2 seems likely. Not likely, but guaranteed, according to one of its stars.

item.title: U.S. stock market this week has one eye on Venezuela and one eye on jobs data
Why traders may need to consider a 'Chuck Norris premium' in the oil market
Trump’s Venezuela raid could worsen America’s affordability crisis. Here’s how.
Opinion: How Trump’s Venezuela raid could worsen America’s affordability crisis

Widening K-shaped economy pattern across income groups
item.description: Bank of America data reveals a stark K-shaped economy as higher-income Americans spend 2.6% more while lower-income households manage just 0.6% growth...

item.title: Bill Ackman slams California wealth tax as ‘expropriation’ of private property
item.description: Bill Ackman slams California's proposed billionaire wealth tax as "expropriation of private property" as tech moguls reportedly consider leaving the s...

item.title: IRS guidance for Trump's 'no tax on tips' and overtime deductions: What to know
item.description: The IRS released new guidance for no tax on tips and overtime deductions under the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. Eligible workers can claim up to $25,00...

item.title: Americans surge toward financial resolutions for 2026 amid household budget concerns
item.description: More Americans are planning financial resolutions for 2026, with 64% focusing on short-term savings goals amid inflation concerns, up from 56% last ye...

item.title: Oil and gas prices expected to stay significantly lower through 2026
item.description: Oil and gas prices are set to drop by 2026, with Brent crude falling to $55 per barrel and retail gas reaching $3 per gallon, according to new EIA pro...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
